name.jp: わくわく指輪ボックス
name.sp: Caja de Probabilidad de Anillo de la Suerte
name.vi: Hộp cơ hội chiếc nhẫn may mắn

description.en: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.ar: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.br: Contém itens aleatórios e uma chance de obter um Anel.
description.cns: 装有各种戒指的盒子。可能开出被强化的戒指。另外，他还包含了年糕汤，示爱烟火或无敌技能卷。
description.de: Wenn du Glück hast, kannst du aus der Box einen Ring erhalten.
description.fi: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.fil: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.fr: boîte contenant... si vous êtes chanceux. un anneau
description.id: Kotak ini dapat berisi Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, atau Intelli Rings. Memungkinkan untuk di Upgrade sebagian.. Selain itu, dapat berisi berbagai macam Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, atau Activitions juga.
description.it: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.jp: ランダムでメテオフィ(4つのステータスが+3)などのアイテムがもらえます。
description.nl: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.pl: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.ru: Вполне возможно, внутри лежит кольцо силача, ловкача, тягача или умника - а может быть, даже Тринити. А если повезет, еще и усиленное. А если совсем повезет, кроме кольца в коробке окажется боржч, фейерверк-признание или свиток Действуй!.
description.sp: Esta caja puede contener Meteofy, Anillos de Vigor, Aguante, Destreza o Inteligencia. Posiblemente incluso los mejorados parcialmente. Además, puede contener una variedad de Ddukguk, Galletas Corazón o Activadores también.
description.sw: This box can contain Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek, or Intelli Rings. Possibly even partially upgraded ones. Additionally, it can contain assorted Ddukguk, Heart Crackers, or Activitions as well.
description.th: กล่องนี้สามารถบรรจุ Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek หรือ Intelli Rings อาจมีการอัพเกรดเพียงบางส่วน นอกจากนี้ยังสามารถบรรจุDdukguk Heart Crackers หรือกิจกรรมต่างๆ ได้อีกด้วย
description.tw: 內含有活力戒指，史丹姆戒指，歐蕾克戒指，音特爾戒指和其他物品的禮物盒
description.vi: Hộp này có thể chứa Meteofy, Vigor, Stam, Arek hoặc Intelli Rings. Thậm chí có thể được nâng cấp một phần. Ngoài ra, nó cũng có thể chứa các loại Ddukguk, Heart Crackers hoặc Activitions.
